name: Flaaffy

evolution.description: Flaaffy can evolve into Ampharos at level 11 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 9 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Wool Pokémon. In the places on its body where fleece doesn’t grow, its skin is rubbery and doesn’t conduct electricity. Those spots are safe to touch.

abilities.name: Static
abilities.description: When this Pokémon is hit by a melee attack, roll a d4. On a result of 4, the attacker takes an amount of electric damage equal to this Pokemon's proficiency bonus.

abilities.name: Plus
abilities.description: This Pokémon boosts its attack and damage rolls by 2 if an ally also has a Plus or Minus ability
